narrative.narrative: Magnicharters is based at Mexico City with focus airports at Monterrey,Leon and Guadalajara. Outside of these 4 they operate at 7 other Mexican airports and 2 in the US, Las Vegas and Orlando. Despite there name they do fly these on a scheduled basis but do also offer charters. Its main focus is the beach resorts of Mexico like Cancun,San Jose del Cabo,Puerto Vallarta,Acapulco,Mazatlan,Huatulco and Ixtapa, the other 7 Mexican airports it serves. As of December 2014 its fleet had nine 737-300's and one 737-500.In the past it has had 737-200 Adv.'s, 737-200's and for a very short time in 1996 two 737-100's. The company was founded in 1994 and started service in January 1995.
